rules_text:
Flash
When Mable enters, you gain 2 life and draw a card.
special_text:
First mate–Each nonland card in your starting deck is an instant or has flash. [i](If this card outside the game is your chosen first mate, you may swap it with a card in your opening hand.)[/i]
